name: DOFUS Touch (Lindo)
description:
Lindo allow you to play DofusTouch without android emulator, it's entirely coded in javascript via electron & angular. Lindo is totally cross-platform.
https://github.com/prixe/lindo
content:
files:
- targz: https://github.com/prixe/lindo/releases/download/v2.4.0/lindo-2.4.0.tar.gz
game:
  exe: Lindo
installer:
- extract:
    src: targz
